channel.title: MoparScape client opens, loads a tiny bit, then exits (more info inside)
channel.description:
I've recently had a craving to start playing MoparScape once again, and I was excited to do so. However, I downloaded the regular MoparScape client (3.2 w/Aryan) and the same thing happens every time, no matter how much I delete and re-install. I open it, the black screen (Running Bot) stays empty, the client loads but stays at "Starting Up" until it finally closes and goes to the Running Bot, which says "press any key to continue", which just closes the Running bot.
I know this is probably on this website a million times, but I truthfully used the search engine and couldn't find anything at all, so I'm very sorry about that.
Does anybody know how I can finally solve this problem? I use Windows XP, and all the MoparScape files are saved in a folder called MoparScape on my desktop, which I doubt changes anything.
Thank you in advanced! :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 05:03:21 pm[/size][hr] :|.............. Bump

item.description:
@Somnium wrote:

I’ve recently had a craving to start playing MoparScape once again, and I was excited to do so.
However, I downloaded the regular MoparScape client (3.2 w/Aryan) and the same thing happens every time, no matter how much I delete and re-install.
I open it, the black screen (Running Bot) stays empty, the client loads but stays at “Starting Up” until it finally closes and goes to the Running Bot, which says “press any key to continue”, which just closes the Running bot.

I know this is probably on this website a million times, but I truthfully used the search engine and couldn’t find anything at all, so I’m very sorry about that.

Does anybody know how I can finally solve this problem? I use Windows XP, and all the MoparScape files are saved in a folder called MoparScape on my desktop, which I doubt changes anything.

Thank you in advanced! :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 05:03:21 pm[/size][hr] :|… Bump
